Articles.title: 'this is not a nft'
Articles.text: 'This is not a nft' is the symbol of my collection. That’s why it’s named like it. I do not stand with values shared with nfts and cryptocurrency. That’s my vision and i completely get it if you do. I think creating a new system built bearly the same as the old one creates the same problems.

Articles.title: sketches
Articles.text: As you can see from the image, I conducted paper research for the logo. I then vectorized most of my sketches on Ilustrator to finally choose the final logo on the homepage.

Articles.title: searches
Articles.text: The real meaning of my nfts is the criticism of the system in which they fit themselves.Indeed, I am personally not in phase with the values and means of functioning of the blockchain. I find that the universe of crypto-currencies and nfts is well associated with the abysmal theme full of unknown and dangers.

Articles.title: meanings
Articles.text: My moodboard on the right represents very well the universe and the imprint that I wanted to retranscribe through my nfts and the site dedicated to them. The very pure style of ultra minimalism combined with vectorial forms made on Illustrator and fonts from the PP Agency foundry brings this cold and mysterious side of the abyss
